title: Commending Firefighter Joe Presutti upon the occasion of his designation for special recognition after 50 years of dedicated service to the Coldenham Fire Company
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  commending  Firefighter  Joe  Presutti upon the
occasion of his designation for special recognition after  50  years  of
dedicated service to the Coldenham Fire Company

WHEREAS,  The firefighters of New York State are renowned throughout the
Nation; their reputation is synonymous with excellence  in  the  arduous
field of fire protection and prevention; and
  WHEREAS,  Since  the  early  days  of "teapot steamers," the volunteer
firefighter has been the cornerstone of our great  Nation's  efforts  to
spare us from the ravages of fire; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly  proud  to  commend
Firefighter  Joe  Presutti  upon  the  occasion  of  his designation for
special recognition after 50 years of dedicated service to the Coldenham
Fire Company; this auspicious occasion was celebrated on Saturday, Janu-
ary 15, 2011, at the Annual Installation Dinner-Dance of  the  Coldenham
Fire Company and Ladies Auxiliary; and
  WHEREAS, Firefighter Joe Presutti has devoted over 50 years of distin-
guished  service  to  the  Coldenham  Fire  Company, commencing with his
appointment in 1961; and
  WHEREAS, Having served the Coldenham Fire Company in  many  capacities
over  the  years,  Firefighter Joe Presutti has most recently served the
Company as Vice President of the Benevolent Association and as  Trustee;
and
  WHEREAS,  Volunteer firefighters and fire departments not only provide
the critical service of fire protection but also engage in other  activ-
ities of great benefit and importance to the communities they serve; and
  WHEREAS, It takes a special dedication, a strong desire to help others
and  a  tireless sense of community to forsake precious time with family
and friends to respond to the signal that a neighbor  is  in  need;  Joe
Presutti  is  such  a  firefighter; throughout his many years of devoted
service, this volunteer heroically performed, above and beyond the  call
of   duty,   those  responsibilities  which  define  the  task  of  fire
protection; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
commend  Firefighter  Joe  Presutti upon the occasion of his designation
for special recognition after 50  years  of  dedicated  service  to  the
Coldenham Fire Company; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Firefighter Joe Presutti.
